subject: feat(ui): build home screen, station detail, and core components (Deliverables 3-4)
body:
Implement the full user-facing app shell with search, map, list, and detail views.

Home screen: location detection → fuel type chips → radius chips → map/list
toggle → station cards sorted by distance or cheapest price.

Station detail: full price list with staleness indicators, Get Directions
button (deep link to native maps), phone tap-to-call, amenity chips.

Components: FuelMap, StationMarker, StationCard, StationList, PriceDisplay,
FuelTypeSelector, RadiusSelector.

Hooks: useLocation (GPS + JHB fallback), useStations (RPC + grouping),
useFuelTypes (Supabase query).

Utilities: navigation.ts (platform deep links), formatting.ts (prices,
distances, dates, staleness).
